Subsection.Text: Except as provided in subsection (2), when the admissibility under this chapter of other evidence of the contents of writings, recordings, or photographs depends upon the existence of a preliminary fact, the question as to whether the preliminary fact exists is for the court to determine.
The trier of fact shall determine whether:

Paragraph.Text: Another writing, recording, or photograph produced at the trial is the original.
Other evidence of the contents correctly reflects the contents.
